title: Drawing, "Decorative Project: Three Trapezoids with Flora and Zefiro"
medium: Pen and ink on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on recto: 3 ninfeche portano corone di fiori; 4 ninfe che portano frutti e fiori; le tre grazie.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Decorative Project: Three Trapezoids with Flora and Zephyrs; nymphs with wreaths; nymphs and shepherds with wreaths.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Decorative Project: Three Trapezoids with Flora and Zefiro".
Pen and ink on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1667.
